subject: fix: move debug pill to HTML level — shows even when JS bundle fails
body:
The debug pill was created inside the JS bundle (main.jsx). If the bundle
failed to load, parse, or execute (stale SW cache, network error, JS crash),
the pill never appeared — leaving users with an infinite spinner and no way
to diagnose the problem.

Changes:
- index.html: inline <script> creates debug pill at HTML level with error
  capture (window.onerror, unhandledrejection), circular buffer (200 max),
  diagnostics view, and 10-second loading timeout warning
- main.jsx: removed ~170 lines of duplicate banner code; now bridges to
  HTML pill via window.__debugPushError() for React component stacks
